name: Metal 3-Rope Hair Chain
description: Beautiful hair accessory available in gold or silver. Please specify in your order which color you would like.

name: Invisible Track Eyelashes
description:
Carefully remove the eyelashes from the case with tweezers
Compare false eyelashes with your eye line length, trim to suitable length and width. Add glue along the false eyelash root with cotton bud. Hold the eyelash on the root of your natural lashes with pressure. If necessary, apply eye shadow or eyeliner to make your eye line look more natural.
***They can be removed by eye makeup remover and can be reused when applied with care.
***ORDER COMES WITH 4 SETS***

name: Premium Real Mink Eyelashes*Full strip
description:
Hand made mink strip lashes. High quality materials which allows you multiple uses. This product comes with a FREE tube of Duo adhesive. Please specify with your order if you prefer clear or black.  
**Comes with two full lash sets**

name: Virgin Indian Straight 12"-30"
description:
All bundles are 4oz, full cuticle and are double drawn weft. Soft, no tangles and no shedding. Our Indian hair is 100% virgin hair without processing and dying of its natural color (natural black with little brown). You can dye, bleach, & iron as well. After washing, it returns to the same texture. 

*If you are doing a full head you would need approx. 2-3 bundles depending on the length. The longer the length of the hair, the shorter the weft will be. Means you will need more hair per oz.
*Treat this hair just as if it was your own hair, it needs proper care and treatment.
